title: Swordhaven: Iron Conspiracy from the ATOM RPG team has a demo and Kickstarter live
description: The team behind the post-apocalyptic ATOM RPG have launched a demo and crowdfunding campaign for Swordhaven: Iron Conspiracy, a fantasy cRPG inspired by Infinity Engine titles like Baldur's Gate 1, Icewind Dale and other classics.

title: KDE Plasma app Ark gets support for self-extracting .exe archive files
description: In another of their regular update blog posts, KDE's Nate Graham has highlighted some recent new KDE Plasma features coming soon to the desktop.

title: Free and open source action-adventure RPG 'Veloren' update 0.16 out now
description: It's free, it's open source and it's looking good! Veloren is a action-adventure role-playing game set in a vast fantasy world and a brand new release is out with update 0.16.

title: Sci-fi deck-builder Hyperspace Deck Command has a demo out now
description: Hyperspace Deck Command is the next game in the Hyperspace Anthology from Sleeper Games that includes their two previous games Swirl W@tch and ---Red---Tether-->.

title: Nova, a Rust-based Linux driver for NVIDIA GPUs announced
description: Danilo Krummrich who is a Red Hat display driver team Software Engineer, announced the Nova project, a Rust-based GSP-only driver for Nvidia GPUs.

title: chiaki4deck the PlayStation Remote Play app for Steam Deck tweaks rumble
description: Continuing to push out small but useful sounding tweaks, the unnoficial PlayStation Remote Play app for Steam Deck, chiaki4deck, has another little update out to make the experience better.

title: Orange Pi Neo Linux gaming handheld starts at $499 with Ryzen 7840U, Ryzen 8840U at $599
description: After being revealed early in February, the upcoming Orange Pi Neo that will come with Manjaro Linux now has a price, and there will be multiple versions of it although we still don't exactly have a clear release date.

title: GOG begin funding indie devs with Loco Motive releasing this Summer
description: GOG have announced that they're getting into game funding, with the first partnership being a boost for developers from Robust Games and publisher Chucklefish for their upcoming title Loco Motive.

title: Ubuntu 24.04 increases vm.max_map_count for smoother Linux gaming
description: At last! Users from Ubuntu 24.04 onwards that's scheduled to release on April 25th should hopefully see a smoother Linux gaming experience.
